data.lyric:
[ti:All I Know So Far (Explicit)]
[ar:P!NK]
[al:All I Know So Far (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.76]All I Know So Far (Explicit) - P!NK
[00:02.17]Lyrics by：Alecia Moore/Benj Pasek/Justin Paul
[00:03.61]Composed by：Alecia Moore/Benj Pasek/Justin Paul
[00:05.19]
[00:09.07]Haven't always been this way
[00:11.53]
[00:13.31]I wasn't born a renegade
[00:15.72]
[00:17.68]I felt alone still feel afraid
[00:20.72]
[00:22.13]I stumbled through it anyway
[00:24.45]
[00:26.57]I wish someone would have told me that this life is ours to choose
[00:30.89]No one's handing you the keys or a book with all the rules
[00:35.11]
[00:35.72]The little that I know I'll tell to you
[00:39.02]
[00:39.64]When they dress you up in lies and you're left naked with the truth
[00:44.81]
[00:46.20]You throw your head back and you spit in the wind
[00:50.84]Let the walls crack 'cause it let's the light in
[00:55.15]Let 'em drag you through hell
[00:57.22]They can't tell you to change who you are
[01:00.89]
[01:01.55]That's all I know so far
[01:03.69]And when the storm's out you run in the rain
[01:08.51]Put your sword down dive right into the pain
[01:12.67]Stay unfiltered and loud you'll be proud of that skin full of scars
[01:18.72]
[01:20.45]That's all I know so far
[01:23.39]
[01:24.82]That's all I know so far
[01:26.70]So you might give yourself away yeah
[01:30.48]
[01:31.16]And pay full price for each mistake
[01:33.55]
[01:35.37]But when the candy-coating hides the razor blade
[01:38.71]
[01:39.76]You can cut yourself loose and use that rage
[01:43.60]
[01:44.17]I wish someone would have told me that this darkness comes and goes
[01:48.27]
[01:48.97]People will pretend but baby girl nobody knows
[01:52.75]
[01:53.33]And even I can't teach you how to fly
[01:56.55]
[01:57.32]But I can show you have to live like your life is on the line
[02:02.68]
[02:03.91]You throw your head back and you spit in the wind
[02:08.69]Let the walls crack 'cause it let's the light in
[02:12.96]Let 'em drag you through hell
[02:15.04]They can't tell you to change who you are
[02:19.01]
[02:19.53]That's all I know so far
[02:21.78]And when the storm's out you run in the rain
[02:26.34]Put your sword down dive right into the pain
[02:30.51]Stay unfiltered and loud you'll be proud of that skin full of scars
[02:36.56]
[02:38.31]That's all I know so far
[02:40.49]That's all I know that's all I know so far
[02:44.89]That's all I know that's all I know so far
[02:49.32]That's all I know that's all I know so far
[02:53.84]That's all I know that's all I know so far
[02:57.93]I will be with you 'til the world blows up yes
[03:05.99]
[03:06.86]Up and down and through 'til the world blows up
[03:11.49]
[03:12.69]Yeah
[03:15.45]When it's right or it's all f**ked up 'til the world blows up
[03:20.35]
[03:20.93]'Til the world blows up
[03:24.42]And we will be enough and until the world blows up
[03:32.83]Just throw your head back and spit in the wind
[03:36.99]
[03:37.49]Let the walls crack 'cause it let's the light in
[03:41.83]Let 'em drag you through hell
[03:43.86]They can't tell you to change who you are
[03:49.34]
[03:50.58]And when the storm's out you run in the rain
[03:55.26]Put your sword down dive right into the pain
[03:59.38]Stay unfiltered and loud you'll be proud of that skin full of scars
[04:05.37]
[04:07.24]That's all I know so far
[04:09.37]That's all I know that's all I know so far
[04:13.72]That's all I know that's all I know so far
[04:18.13]That's all I know that's all I know so far
[04:22.67]That's all I know that's all I know so far
[04:26.79]I will be with you 'til the world blows up hm
data.trans:
[ti:All I Know So Far (Explicit)]
[ar:P!NK]
[al:All I Know So Far (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.76]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.17]//
[00:03.61]//
[00:05.19]
[00:09.07]人生不会一路坎坷
[00:11.53]
[00:13.31]我并非天生就是叛徒
[00:15.72]
[00:17.68]我曾孤独无助 也仍然在害怕担忧
[00:20.72]
[00:22.13]但我还是磕磕绊绊地走过这样的道路
[00:24.45]
[00:26.57]我希望有人能来告诉我 这人生我们要自己做主
[00:30.89]没有人会教你秘籍诀窍 或是给你一本记好了所有规则的书
[00:35.11]
[00:35.72]我了解的那一点道理 我会告知于你
[00:39.02]
[00:39.64]当他们用谎言来给你装扮 而真相只能让你赤裸身体
[00:44.81]
[00:46.20]仰头放松 不用挣扎什么
[00:50.84]让你的围墙坍塌 那样阳光就能冲破阻隔
[00:55.15]放任他们将你拖入地狱
[00:57.22]他们不能要你改变自己
[01:00.89]
[01:01.55]这就是我迄今学到的全部
[01:03.69]等到狂风暴雨肆虐的时候 你就冲进雨中
[01:08.51]放下防身的宝剑 没入痛苦的深渊
[01:12.67]不用掩饰 大胆宣扬 你会为满身的伤痕而自豪
[01:18.72]
[01:20.45]这就是我迄今学到的全部
[01:23.39]
[01:24.82]这就是我迄今学到的全部
[01:26.70]你可能会露出马脚
[01:30.48]
[01:31.16]为每一个错误付出惨重代价
[01:33.55]
[01:35.37]但是当糖衣包裹了刀锋
[01:38.71]
[01:39.76]你或许会不经意划伤自己 或许会被愤怒支配理智
[01:43.60]
[01:44.17]我希望有人能告诉我 黑暗来过又走了
[01:48.27]
[01:48.97]人们会戴上伪装的面具 但是宝贝女孩 没有人知道
[01:52.75]
[01:53.33]就算是我也不能告诉你 该如何展翅翱翔
[01:56.55]
[01:57.32]但我能让你看到 怎样在危险的边缘存活
[02:02.68]
[02:03.91]仰头放松 不用挣扎什么
[02:08.69]让你的围墙坍塌 那样阳光就能冲破阻隔
[02:12.96]放任他们将你拖入地狱
[02:15.04]他们不能要你改变自己
[02:19.01]
[02:19.53]这就是我迄今学到的全部
[02:21.78]等到狂风暴雨嘶吼 你大胆奔进雨中
[02:26.34]放下防身的宝剑 没入痛苦的深渊
[02:30.51]不用掩饰 大胆宣扬 你会为满身的伤痕而自豪
[02:36.56]
[02:38.31]这就是我迄今学到的全部
[02:40.49]这就是我学到的全部 这就是我迄今学到的全部
[02:44.89]这就是我学到的全部 这就是我迄今学到的全部
[02:49.32]这就是我学到的全部 这就是我迄今学到的全部
[02:53.84]这就是我学到的全部 这就是我迄今学到的全部
[02:57.93]在世界末日到来之前 我都会陪在你的身边 是的
[03:05.99]
[03:06.86]在世界末日到来之前 无论高峰低谷都陪你走过 
[03:11.49]
[03:12.69]// 
[03:15.45]在世界末日到来之前 无论顺境逆境我都不会放弃你
[03:20.35]
[03:20.93]在世界末日到来之前
[03:24.42]我们在一起就足够 在世界末日到来之前
[03:32.83]仰头放松 不用挣扎什么
[03:36.99]

[03:41.83]放任他们将你拖入地狱

[03:50.58]等到狂风暴雨肆虐的时候 你就冲进雨中

[03:59.38]不用掩饰 大胆宣扬 你会为满身的伤痕而自豪
[04:05.37]
[04:07.24]这就是我迄今学到的全部
[04:09.37]这就是我学到的全部 这就是我迄今学到的全部
[04:13.72]这就是我学到的全部 这就是我迄今学到的全部
